= !SymPy documentation =

All documentation is at: 

You can also easily generate all the docs in your copy of !SymPy by doing:
{{{
$ cd doc
$ make html
$ epiphany _build/html/index.html
}}}
(use your favourite browser instead of epiphany if you want)
